moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Kanna
characters.description: Katara's and Sokka's grandmother, cute old laady, leadership 101

moves.name: Old Wisdom
moves.description: Kanna uses her wisdom to launch an attack of knowledge

moves.name: Gentle Hands
moves.description: Kanna touches the ground with her gentle hands and moves the water beneath to reach her opponent

moves.name: Liquid Embrace
moves.description: Kanna traps her opponent in a water bubble

moves.name: Ice Spear
moves.description: Kanna throws a spear of ice directly at her opponent

new moves.name: Liquid Embrace
new moves.description: Aang traps her opponent in a water bubble
